sentences.english: Now I'm single and I have no friends. FML

sentences.english: The Simurgh saw the helpless babe lying at the foot of the mountain.

sentences.english: One should have pity on the beggar in the street.

sentences.english: While I felt safe, I was also isolated.

sentences.english: That's why even Mom says you will end up a lonely guy.
